name: Octillery
description: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

abilities.name: Rapid Strike Search
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Rapid Strike card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can’t use more than 1 Rapid Strike Search Ability each turn.
